TitMainTitle: Table display with signs that read "Hiring on Ability Helps The Employer, The Worker, The Community Employing on Merit Without Discrimination Is Good Business," "Pennsylvania F.E.P.C. Investigated Charges of Job Discrimination Race Religion Color Ancestry Age, Fair Employment Practices," "Fair Employers ask: Is He A Good Worker? Not What's His Race Color Religion?" "Individual Human Rights Program..." "Commission on Human Relations Office of The Mayor..." and "Intergroup Relations Program..." in interior with bookshelves and mural inscribed "The Good Old Days"
